items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds for 95% of cases
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to create and manage shared boards for organizing tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a shared board and invite team members via email.
All invited members can add, edit, and delete tasks on the shared board.
non_functional: Board load time must be under 3 seconds
Data consistency maintained across all clients

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat, file sharing, and notifications may be considered in future iterations.
